content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I am glad we are on the same page about the rental price. I am sure you will find the apartment to your liking. Let's try to get the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. Well, I think a reasonable price for this apartment would be 800 Euros per month. It's in the city center, after all.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: That is a low price for such a great apartment. I am sure we can get more. Let's continue negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, how about 850 Euros per month? That's a fair price for this location and the amenities.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 850 Euros is still not enough for such a great apartment. I am sure we can get more. Let's continue negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, I'm willing to go up to 900 Euros per month. That's a significant increase, and I think it's a fair price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 900 Euros is still not enough for such a great apartment. I am sure we can get more. Let's continue negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I think 950 Euros per month is more than fair, considering the location and the amenities. 
[[/manager]][[user]]
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 950 Euros is still not enough for such a great apartment. I am sure we can get more. Let's continue negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a reasonable price, but I can go up to 1000 Euros per month. That's the best I can do.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of [1000] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
